name: Seneca
description:
Seneca was founded as a sanctuary from a world on the brink of collapse. Discover the secrets behind the technology you need to survive.

In this RPG game demo, you play as Astrid, a teenager searching for her lost friend in a sci-fi world. Solve puzzles, learn mysteries, and find old secrets in Seneca.

Genre: Adventure
Play time: ~15-20 minutes
